page.title: 09RECREATION IN DALRY
page.content: There is not much entertainment in Dalry. The latest craze is BMX bikes and there is a track in the park. It also has a tennis court, boating pond, and putting and bowling greens. Children can bowl on Saturday morning. We have no swimming pool or cinema, although there used to be two cinemas. The Community Centre runs a bus to Kilbirnie swimmimg pool on Wednesdays and runs regular discos. There are many clubs, like Girl Guides, Scouts, Karate, Judo, Computing, Girls' and Boys' Brigades etc. For adults there are pubs, bowling, bingo on Tuesdays, a centre for senior citizens, and at the Community Centre, clubs like sewing, keep-fit and drama. Most people stay at home watching T.V. but there is quite a lot to do if they just look for it.I hope the Government will pay for better facilities.
